message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I believe it could greatly benefit you as well. Given its high quality and unique features, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true value to me and its perceived value to you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and hope to discuss the details further with you soon.
